`{chestergeo}` contains tools for accessing geographical data for Chesterfield County, VA, including data relating to Chesterfield County Public Schools (CCPS).

# Installation

You can install `{chestergeo}` from Github via the following:

```{r install-block, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ccps-research-eval/chestergeo")
```
